appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px;\"\u003e\r\n     \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; margin-bottom: 0; background-color: #0c9a86;\r\n     border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px;\r\n     color: #ffffff; font-family: sans-serif;\"\u003e\r\n         \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #fff\"\u003eStock Trading Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n     \u003c/div\u003e\r\n     \u003cdiv style\u003d\"flex: 1 1 auto; padding: 1.25rem;padding-bottom:0;\"\u003e\r\n         \u003cdiv style\u003d\"display: flex;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003cdiv style\u003d\"min-width: 90px; height: 90px; display: flex; align-items: center;justify-content: center;\r\n             margin-right: 16px;background-color: #ffefc9;border-radius: 5px;\"\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"font-weight: 600; font-size: 34px; color: #f3be45;\"\u003eST\u003c/span\u003e\r\n             \u003c/div\u003e\r\n             \u003cdiv\u003e\r\n               \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003eOverview of Stock Trading\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n                 \u003cp style\u003d\"margin-top:10px; text-align:justify;\"\u003e\r\n                   \u003cspan\u003eThe Stock Analysis and Forecasting App is a powerful tool designed for investors, traders, and financial analysts to perform in-depth analysis of stock market data. By integrating various analytical techniques and machine learning algorithms, the app offers valuable insights into stock behavior, risk assessment, anomaly detection, and future price predictions.\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                 \u003c/p\u003e\r\n             \u003c/div\u003e            \r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n            \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003eKey Features\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n             \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Provides interactive visualizations and statistical summaries of historical stock data.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Compares expected returns with risk metrics to evaluate the risk-return trade-off.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\t\t\t \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Utilizes machine learning algorithms such as isolation forest or autoencoders to detect anomalies in stock prices.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\t\t\t \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Employs time-series forecasting techniques such as Prophet or ARIMA to predict future stock prices.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n             \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \r\n         \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003eKey Outcome\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n             \u003cul style\u003d\"margin-left: 10px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0;\"\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Offers a holistic view of stock market data, enabling users to perform thorough analysis from data exploration to forecasting.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                 \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                    Provides actionable insights into risk assessment, anomaly detection, and future price predictions to support investment decisions.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\t\t\t \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Allows users to customize analysis parameters, visualize results, and interact with data in an intuitive interface.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\t\t\t \u003cspan style\u003d\"width:18px;height:18px;background-color:#0c9a86;color:#fff;border-radius:50%;position:absolute;left:22px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:20px;font-weight:600;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\u003cli style\u003d\"position: relative; margin-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Automates complex analytical tasks, saving time and effort for users in analyzing large datasets and generating forecasts.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n             \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n     \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top:20px;\"\u003e         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n       \r\n     \u003c/div\u003e\r\n \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Get Started",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "success",
              "rightIcon": "fa fa-arrow-right",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "getStarted",
              "type": "button",
              "input": true,
              "event": "next"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    }
  ]
}
